content: **drops crochet toys the trouser man and cock s comb ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size approx 23 cm / 9 tall materials drops paris from garnstudio the dolls weigh less than 50 g use remains and choose colors of your own choice see picture for suggestions drops crochet hook size 4mm/ us g accessories poly stuffing for filling **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=34
